data.title: Company Profile: Nikon Corporation
data.meta_description: Nikon provides products and services based on the core technologies of Opto-Electronics Technologies and Precision Technologies and through its corporate philosophy of Trustworthiness and Creativity. It is a global company that supports the realization of an even more prosperous society by responding to the hopes and expectations of people and industries.
data.text:
Overview

Nikon provides products and services based on the core technologies of Opto-Electronics Technologies and Precision Technologies and through its corporate philosophy of Trustworthiness and Creativity. It is a global company that supports the realization of an even more prosperous society by responding to the hopes and expectations of people and industries.
